## IDecoratorRegistration.dispose() method

Specifies disposer action during resolution disposal.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dispose<K extends T>(action: Disposer<K>): WithDecoratorRegisterLazy<K>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  action | <code>Disposer&lt;K&gt;</code> | disposer action to be called during resolution disposal process ([Disposer](./typeioc.disposer.md)<!-- -->) |

<b>Returns:</b>

`WithDecoratorRegisterLazy<K>`

- an instance of [WithDecoratorRegisterLazy](./typeioc.withdecoratorregisterlazy.md) interface
